alert.note: Alert for Dooly; Macon; Sumter (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 10:38AM EDT until March 31 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River at GA 26 near Montezuma affecting Sumter, Macon and Dooly Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Flint River at GA 26 near Montezuma. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and extensive flood plain along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 26. The access road to Georges Boat Landing is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EDT Friday the stage was 20.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 AM EDT Friday was 22.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 20 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
